story_20_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
That’s one of Team Break’s hideouts...
They’re keeping their stolen Pokémon in that cave.
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: It’s pretty well guarded. We’ll have to be careful!
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Espurr and I can handle the guards.
Wait here. We’ll take care of them.
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: What? Why don’t we all go together?
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yeah, let’s do it together, Calem!
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
We’ll be fine as long as we all stick close
to one another.
story_20_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: All right, let’s do this. Come on, everyone!
